name: St. Paul's School
description: This is the Official App of St. Pauls School, a kindergarten through twelfth grade college-preparatory day school in Brooklandville, Maryland founded in 1849.  Staying up to date and keeping in touch with St. Pauls School is now easier and more enjoyable than ever before. You can experience first-hand the spirit and energy of a school proud of its history and traditions.  Some of the features include:  * NEWS  Stay up to date with the latest news at St. Pauls School. * EVENTS  See whats happening at St. Pauls and add events directly to your phones calendar. * DIRECTORY  Easily find the contacts you need and add them directly to your phone. * ATHLETICS  Show your school spirit and check the latest scores and schedules! * NOTIFICATIONS  Get instant updates and important announcements from St. Pauls School. * RADIO  Tune in to SPS Radio, the Voice of St. Pauls! * CAMPUS MAP  Look up buildings on campus and get detailed information.  Use these features, and more, to keep in touch with St. Pauls School. Everything you need to know about St. Pauls School is right at your fingertips!
